description: This file contains CLI command implementations for managing resources and user authentication in the 'agno' project. It includes functions for deleting configuration, authenticating users, initializing the CLI environment, and starting/stopping/patching resources, utilizing external modules and classes related to configuration, logging, and resource management.

methods.name: delete_agno_config
methods.description: Deletes the existing Agno configuration directory.

methods.name: authenticate_user
methods.description: Handles user authentication flow via web browser, token retrieval, and config update.

methods.name: initialize_agno
methods.description: Initializes the Agno CLI environment, optionally performing user login and configuration setup.

methods.name: start_resources
methods.description: Starts/deploys resources based on a specified resource file and target parameters.

methods.name: stop_resources
methods.description: Stops/deletes resources based on a specified resource file and target parameters.

methods.name: patch_resources
methods.description: Updates/patches resources based on a specified resource file and target parameters.
